description: Explore Arbitrum's innovative open source licensing strategy and its impact on Ethereum scalability. Dive into how Arbitrum enhances transparency, security, and collaboration through the Apache 2.0 License, while addressing challenges with a robust governance model. Learn about its future prospects and broader implications for blockchain technology.
keywords: Arbitrum, open source licensing, Ethereum scalability, Apache 2.0 License, blockchain technology, transparency, security, collaboration, governance, intellectual property, software development
title: Arbitrum's Innovative Open Source Licensing Approach
